Properties

deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0435 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
DNR Do not resuscitateDo not resuscitate
N No directiveNo directive

name: AdvanceDirective
title: advanceDirective
description: Code system of concepts specifying the patient's instructions to the healthcare facility.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PV2 and PD1 segments.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0435 (Advance Directive Code)

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
